channel.title: How to make everything non-wildy but wildy stays wildy
channel.description: when i walk to like varrock its all a wildy how can i make it so its all safe but the wildy??? :|

item.title: How to make everything non-wildy but wildy stays wildy
item.dc:creator: @labeeb labeeb
item.description:
@labeeb wrote:

Go to the top right of the non wild area.

control F: if ((absX >=

Press Enter : add if ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

add the coords

go to bottom left:
add if ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) again under it

itl close that area to safe

Read full topic
item.source: How to make everything non-wildy but wildy stays wildy

item.title: How to make everything non-wildy but wildy stays wildy
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“pur3pk3r4, post:3, topic:289393”][quote author=dillingo link=topic=382549.msg2873029#msg2873029 date=1247879612]
search for public boolean nonWild
You’ll see something like this.
if ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
The first set of numbers are the most southern x coordinates, the next are the most northern. Then the most eastern, then the most western. I THINK that’s it. I havn’t made a nonwild zone in a long time so some things might be reversed.

[/quote]

i dont get 1 word u said lol[/quote]
Open client.java and search for public boolean nonWild. Then it will make scence.

Read full topic
